attributes.action: Make the work shy work for there hand outs
attributes.additional_details: Why should all us hard working tax payers go to work to pay for the work shy to sit about while collecting there hand outs. We all know people like this, people who have never worked or have no intention to work. These people often find them selves better off than those of us who have to go to work to pay the bills. Make these people work for the local authority, cleaning the streets etc or stop there money.
